U1

<主標> Lamborghini </主標> <副標> Notebook </副標> <小圖連結> uploadfile/004.jpg </小圖連結> <大圖連結> uploadfile/l_1208282907.jpg </大圖連結>
Lamborghini
Notebook
Embodying Classic Brand
To capture the spirit and power of Lamborghini, we studied their line of cars extensively. The fine detailing of this notebook is on par with an artfully constructed sports car. The visual language of the air vents emulates a wheel cover and the same bold stitches on a car seat have been implemented on the palm rest.
<主標> R2 </主標> <副標> Notebook </副標> <小圖連結> uploadfile/005.jpg </小圖連結> <大圖連結> uploadfile/l_1208282814.jpg </大圖連結>

Ecobook
Notebook
Sensual Poetry
To look and act outside the box, we rigorously explore, experiment and implement techniques that achieve breath-taking results.

<主標> Lamborghini </主標> <副標> Notebook </副標> <小圖連結> uploadfile/009.jpg </小圖連結> <大圖連結> uploadfile/l_1208282983.jpg </大圖連結>
Lamborghini
Notebook
Embodying Classic Brand
To capture the spirit and power of Lamborghini, we studied their line of cars extensively. The fine detailing of this notebook is on par with an artfully constructed sports car. The visual language of the air vents emulates a wheel cover and the same bold stitches on a car seat have been implemented on the palm rest.
<主標> W1 </主標> <副標> Notebook </副標> <小圖連結> uploadfile/010.jpg </小圖連結> <大圖連結> uploadfile/l_1208265036.jpg </大圖連結>
W1
Notebook
Beautiful Utilitarian
The W1 notebook features military aviation grade carbon fiber on its front cover. The material’s strength and lightweight characteristics make it ideal for a product intended for mobility. The design of this notebook uses strong common shapes to harmonize with the rigidity of carbon fiber.
</商品大項>
